SEARCH
Package Core.Managers

Class ObjectLoader

java.lang.Object
Core.Managers.ObjectLoader
public class ObjectLoader extends Object
The ObjectLoader class is responsible for loading 3D models in the Wavefront OBJ format and managing associated resources.

  • Method Details

    • loadOBJModel

      public Model loadOBJModel(String filename)
      Loads a 3D model from an OBJ file.
      Parameters:
      filename - The path to the OBJ file.
      Returns:
      A Model object representing the loaded 3D model.

    • processVertex

      public static void processVertex(int pos, int textCoord, int normal, List<org.joml.Vector2f> textCoordList, List<org.joml.Vector3f> normalList, List<Integer> indicesList, float[] textCoordArr, float[] normalArr)
      Processes a vertex in the OBJ file and updates the corresponding lists.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position index of the vertex.
      textCoord - The texture coordinate index of the vertex.
      normal - The normal vector index of the vertex.
      textCoordList - The list of texture coordinates.
      normalList - The list of normal vectors.
      indicesList - The list of vertex indices.
      textCoordArr - The array to store texture coordinates.
      normalArr - The array to store normal vectors.

    • loadModel

      public Model loadModel(float[] vertices, float[] textureCoords, float[] normals, int[] indices)
      Loads a 3D model with the provided vertex, texture coordinate, normal, and index data.
      Parameters:
      vertices - The array of vertex coordinates.
      textureCoords - The array of texture coordinates.
      normals - The array of normal vectors.
      indices - The array of vertex indices.
      Returns:
      A Model object representing the loaded 3D model.

    • loadTexture

      public int loadTexture(String filename) throws Exception
      Loads a texture from an image file.
      Parameters:
      filename - The path to the image file.
      Returns:
      The OpenGL texture ID for the loaded texture.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during texture loading.

    • cleanup

      public void cleanup()
      Cleans up resources by deleting VAOs, VBOs, and textures.
